title: QA QC question schema
description: A schema for QA QC questions in GitBuilding

baseInput.description: Not to be used, this is a base definition for all inputs.

id.description: The id in for the result in the final database

title.description: The displayed title for the question in GitBuilding

description.description: A description to provide further information

checkboxInput.description: Create a checkbox input for the user to record a task is complete

type.description: The literal value "checkbox" must be used.

textInput.description: Add a text box for the user to enter free text

type.description: The literal value "text" must be used.

numericInput.description: Add a numeric input for the user to enter a value

type.description: The literal value "numeric" must be used.

exclusiveMinimum.description: Use insted of minimum to ensure the value is larger but not equal to the minimum.

exclusiveMaximum.description: Use insted of maximum to ensure the value is smallerr but not equal to the maximum.

multipleOf.description: Force value to be a multiple of this number.

photoInput.description: This option is used to request a photo from the user

type.description: The literal value "photo" must be used.

resizeTo.description: Resize image so that the largest dimnsion is this number of pixels.

allowedFormats.description: List the allowed formats, using MIME type specifiesers (without preceding "image").  For example "png" for Portable Network Graphics.

maximumFileSize.description: Specify the maximum file size in Mb.

fileInput.description: This option is used to request a file from the user.

type.description: The literal value "text" must be used.

maximumFileSize.description: Specify the maximum file size in Mb.
